question:
Consider the following statements about the World Economic Forum:
  1. It is an international forum for the governments and central bank governors
  2. It publishes the Global Energy Architecture Performance Index (EAPI) report
Which of the above statements is/are correct?
explanation: First statement is incorrect. The World Economic Forum (WEF) was founded in 1971. It is an independent international organization that provides a platform for the world's 1000 leading companies to shape a better future. It is committed to improving the state of the world by engaging in international agendas for business, politics and academics. Second statement is correct. The Global Energy Architecture Performance Index (EAPI) is released by the World Economic Forum (WEF). The report for 2017 ranks 127 countries based on their ability to deliver secure, affordable, sustainable energy. India was placed at 87th spot in the list.
